name: Gregor Verga
story: Giourkas has been a member of the BLUFOR army for over 20 years, working tirelessly as a combat life saver to ensure his fellow soldiers receive the best medical care possible. He is well-respected for his calm and collected demeanor, and his ability to keep a cool head even in the most intense situations. Though he is dedicated to his work, Giourkas has always remained a solitary figure, preferring the solitude of his own thoughts to the company of his comrades.
